entry.title: JKM Bulk 25 Yd Satin Blanket Binding - 1" or 2" Folded Width
entry.summary:
Vendor: JKM
Type: Trims & Home Décor
Price: 34.76

Our bulk satin blanket binding is composed of 100% satin. It comes in a beautiful assortment of colors and is available in the following sizes: 1" and 2" folded width on 25 yard spools. Note: JKM bulk colors are close to Wrights packaged blanket binding colors but they are not an exact match.
(Product Characteristic: Bias Tape; Binding Bulk) / (Fabric Content: 100% Polyester)
